2020 Corporate Social Responsibilty ReportGREENHOUSE GAS INVENTORY 
One of Amalgamated Bank’s greatest environmental commitments is maintaining net-zero operations. For the fourth year in a row, we’ve succeeded 
in this commitment through our use of renewable energy in operations and offsets of the few emissions we do have, such as business travel and 
natural gas for heating. We are committed to transparently reporting our climate impacts from operations and the ways in which we achieve net-zero 
operations. Following the GHG Protocol Corporate Accounting Standard, here are our 2020 GHG inventory results:
